text: LG G7 ThinQ is a smartphone developed by LG electronics. It was announced on 2 May 2018. It was released on 1 June 2018. == Features == LG G7 has 6.1 inch IPS LCD, HDR10 screen, Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 (10 nm), 4/6GB RAM, 64/128GB storage, 16MP standard and ultrawide camera, 8MP wide selfie camera, 3000mAh battery capacity and 18W wired charger. == Software == It run Android 8.0 Oreo for the first time, it can upgrade to other versions like Android Pie and Android 10 when they came out. == References == == Other websites == * Category:LG mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2018 Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras
title: LG G7 ThinQ
